section.title: caller_uuid_avp (integer)
section.para: Number of the AVP that contains the UUID of caller.
Default value is 1.

section.title: callee_uuid_avp (integer)
section.para: Number of the AVP that contains the UUID of callee.
Default value is 2.

section.title: db_url (string)
section.para: The URL of the database to be used.
Default value is "mysql://ser:heslo@localhost/ser".

section.title: pref_table (string)
section.para: Name of the user preferences table from which the contents of AVPs will be loaded.
Default value is "usr_preferences".

section.title: uuid_column (string)
section.para: Name of the column that stores UUID in the preferences table.
Default value is "uuid".

section.title: username_column (string)
section.para: Name of the column containing the username of the subscriber.
Default value is "username".

section.title: domain_column (string)
section.para: Name of the column containing the domain that the subscriber belongs to. This is useful when SER is running in multi-domain mode.
Default value is "domain".

section.title: attr_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing attribute names.
Default value is "attribute".

section.title: val_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column containing attribute value.
Default value is "value".

section.title: use_domain (int)
section.para: This parameter controls where the module should use also the domain part, in addition to the username, as the key. This parameter should be set to 1 in multi-domain mode.
Default value is 0.

section.title: pref_list_table (string)
section.para: Name of the table storing user preferences types and default values.
Default value is "usr_preferences_types".

section.title: attr_name_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column in usr_preferences_types table storing names of AVPs.
Default value is "att_name".

section.title: att_type_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column in usr_preferences_types table storing types of AVPs.
Default value is "att_raw_type".

section.title: att_dval_column (string)
section.para: The name of the column in usr_preferences_types table containing default values of AVPs.
Default value is "default_value".
